sentence.Network_en: He remembered the unburied dead he had seen in the war.
sentence.Network_cn: 他想起了他曾在战争中见过那些没有掩埋的尸体.

sentence.Network_en: He ordered her to cast his unburied body into the middle of the public square.
sentence.Network_cn: 他命令她不得将他的遗体下葬,而是将它扔到广场的中央.
